name: Knight`s Diet
description:
A knight, tormented by years of poor eating habits, has entered a dungeon surprisingly not filled with zombies or monsters. This dungeon is filled with all kinds of food (sweets and vegetables alike!) He must learn the ropes of eating healthy. Help him on his journey to overcome his bad habits, and may he live long, merry and healthy!

Use: W, A, S, D to move around.

Avoid bad foods and traps.

Due to the time constraint for the jam, i have uploaded this unfinished piece, i will add a major update to the game, there will be new levels, skins and so much more.

Please leave a follow if you`d like to be notified!

Have fun.

Music by: www.mattpatrickwalsh.bandcamp.com
